entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
